title: How hard is CISA compared to CISSP? - Quora
tags: Certified Information Systems Security Professional (professional certificate)

response.answer_text: I personally feel that the difficulty is in the minds. Once we decided in our mind that something is difficult our efforts will not be wholesome and one will not put his or her best efforts. With right preparation and guidance, nothing is difficult. Have positive attitude and achieve greater heights. A small quote to complete my answer “A fool did not know that it was impossible, so that he did it”

CISSP a bit tougher I guess. But if you are ready to work hard passionately… you can surely clear it. There are lots of people clearing it. So you need to sincerely decide what excites you ‘security operations' or ‘audits' if it's audit go for CISA, if the other go for CISSP. All the best!
